title: The Price of fire
creator_credit: Bruce Parsons, Tom Daly and ONF | NFB
brief_description: Filmed under great difficulty and risk in Montreal’s worst fire zone, this film argues, in ways no audience can ignore, the case for inspection and prevention. It is a strong reminder of the price of carelessness and the need for vigilance, especially during winter months when fire hazards are at their height.
